title: Spaghetti Bolognese
items: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Sauté garlic and onion in olive oil.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Stir in tomato sauce and simmer for 20 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve over spaghetti and top with Parmesan cheese.

title: Grilled Chicken Breast
items: Marinate chicken in olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, and herbs.
Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Cook chicken for 6-8 minutes per side or until fully cooked.
Let rest for 5 minutes before serving.

title: Vegetable Stir-fry
items: Heat oil in a wok or large skillet.
Add chopped vegetables like broccoli, bell peppers, and carrots.
Stir-fry for 5-7 minutes until tender-crisp.
Add soy sauce and a splash of sesame oil.
Serve over steamed rice.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
items: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Cream together butter and sugars.
Add eggs and vanilla extract, mixing well.
Combine dry ingredients and gradually mix into wet ingredients.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls onto baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.

title: Brownies
items: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Melt butter and mix with sugar and cocoa powder.
Add eggs and vanilla extract, mixing well.
Stir in flour and a pinch of salt.
Pour into a baking pan and bake for 20-25 minutes.

title: Apple Pie
items: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Prepare pie crust and place in a pie dish.
Mix sliced apples with sugar, cinnamon, and lemon juice.
Fill crust with apple mixture and cover with a top crust.
Bake for 45-50 minutes until golden brown.

title: Caesar Salad
items: Wash and chop romaine lettuce.
Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Add croutons and Parmesan cheese.
Top with grilled chicken if desired.

title: Bruschetta
items: Toast slices of baguette until crispy.
Top with diced tomatoes, garlic, basil, and olive oil.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately.

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
items: Remove stems from mushrooms and hollow out the caps.
Mix cream cheese, garlic, and herbs for filling.
Stuff each mushroom cap with the filling.
Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 20 minutes or until golden.

title: Pancakes
items: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
Whisk in milk, eggs, and melted butter until smooth.
Heat a griddle and pour batter to form pancakes.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden brown.
Serve with syrup or toppings of your choice.

title: Omelette
items: Beat eggs with salt and pepper.
Heat butter in a non-stick skillet.
Pour eggs into the skillet and cook until set.
Add fillings like cheese, ham, or vegetables.
Fold the omelette in half and serve hot.

title: French Toast
items: Whisk eggs, milk, and cinnamon in a bowl.
Dip slices of bread into the egg mixture.
Cook on a hot griddle until golden brown on both sides.
Serve with syrup, powdered sugar, or fresh fruit.
